about_the_game:
Project CarnEvil is the ultimate VR Horror carnival game, transporting players to a ghostly realm filled with dread and thrills! Prepare to be immersed in an atmospheric landscape as you explore the terrifying carnival.
The only way out of this sinister carnival's grip is to accomplish a series of challenges. Can you survive the four terrifying carnival games and free the lost plushies trapped inside each?
The most difficult challenge of all awaits you in the tent of terror. The land's insane clown king is waiting for you, ready to put your bravery and determination to the test. Are you strong enough to defeat the clown and escape this nightmare?
Keep in mind that the stakes are high, and failure is not an option. Will you be the one to break free from this twisted carnival, or will you become one of the lost souls? You have a choice!
Features:
1. Haunting atmosphere: Project CarnEvil immerses players in a dark and eerie world, complete with spooky music, dim lighting, and unsettling carnival sounds. This game is not for the faint of heart!
2. Terrifying challenges: To escape the carnival, players must beat four terrifying carnival games, each with their own unique set of challenges. From shooting to ring tosses, these games will push players to their limits.
3. Sinister clown boss: The final challenge in Project CarnEvil is facing off against the mad clown ruler of the carnival. This boss battle is intense and requires skill and strategy to defeat.
4. VR immersion: Project CarnEvil is designed for VR, which means players will feel like they're inside the haunted carnival. This level of immersion adds to the intensity and scares of the game.
5. Replayability: With multiple stages and a variety of challenges, Project CarnEvil has high replay value. Players can try to beat their own scores or compete against friends to see who can escape the carnival the fastest.
6. Thrilling storyline: Discover the hidden pages within the game to uncover the horrors of the carnival.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 6th Gen Core i7 or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or newer
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus VR

short_description: Project CarnEvil, the ultimate VR horror experience, invites you to confront your fears. This game will test you to your limits with difficult carnival games and a crazed clown to banish. Will you be able to overcome your fear and escape alive?
